text: Anata gata ni kōun ga otozureru to, kare-ra wa urei, moshi sainan ga anata gata o osoeba, kare-ra wa yorokobu. Daga anata gataga nintai shite,-nushi dake o osorete irunaraba, kare-ra no inbō wa sukoshi mo anata gata o gaishinaidearou. Makotoni arrā wa kare-ra no okonau koto subete o shitte ora reru
